name: Corfu Palace
description: Overlooking Garitsa Bay, the 5-star Corfu Palace offers a thalasotherapy spa centre, an outdoor pool and fine dining. All elegant rooms feature Ionian Sea views. Guests can challenge their luck at the hotel’s casino. WiFi is offered throughout. Hotel Corfu Palace features rooms with a marble bathroom and private balcony or terrace. Room facilities include air conditioning, a satellite TV and hairdryer. 24-hour room service is available. A plentiful buffet breakfast is served at the main restaurant, furnished with Louis XV-style chairs. The a lacarte Scheria Restaurant proposes international menus. Guests can enjoy a drink at one of the 2 indoor bars or at the Café Del Mare poolside bar. Corfu Palace is ideally situated a 10-minute walk from the centre of Corfu town. The island’s airport is 1 km away.

name: Mon Repos Palace - Adults Only
description: The adults-only Mon Repos Palace - Adults Only is located at the tip of Garitsa Bay, within 1 km from the scenic Old Town of Corfu. It features a small freshwater pool with sun loungers, an elegantly decorated restaurant and air-conditioned rooms with a balcony. Each unit is equipped with a fridge, an LCD satellite TV and free WiFi. The private bathroom is stocked with a hairdryer. Guests can start their day with a buffet breakfast served daily at the on-site restaurant, where a variety of international dishes can also be enjoyed during dinner. Coffees, drinks and light meals are available at the snack bar throughout the day. Mon Repos Palace - Adults Only is situated 4 km from Corfu Port and approximately 1.5 km from Ioannis Kapodistrias International Airport. The famous Mon Repos and the Roman Baths are located at 1 km. Car rental services can be provided and free public parking can be found on site.

name: Divani Corfu Palace
description: Built among lush greenery in Kanoni Peninsula and just 3 km from the centre of Corfu Town, the 4-star Divani Corfu Palace features a swimming pool with hot tub. Breakfast is served on a terrace overlooking the bay. Free WiFi is available in all areas. Opening to a balcony with lagoon or garden views, the air-conditioned rooms and suites at Divani Corfu Palace have modern furnishings in earthy colours. Each unit includes flat-screen TV, a minibar and a bathroom with a bath, hairdryer and free toiletries. Some units also have a separate lounge area. The main restaurant serves Greek and international cuisine for lunch and dinner. Featuring sunset views, the Laguna Pool Restaurant is ideal for snacks or drinks. A children’s pool and a playground are available for younger guests. A well-equipped fitness centre is also provided. Corfu International Airport is 2 km away and scenic Palaiokastritsa is at 25 km. Corfu Town with the Venetian Fortress is within a distance of 3 km, and Achilleion Palace is 5 km from the property. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Arion Hotel Corfu
description: Just steps away from Anemomilos Beach and 1.2 km from the centre of Corfu Town, Arion Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with balcony. It has a bar and provides free Wi-Fi in all areas. Former Royal Mon Repo Beach, where guests enjoy free access, is just 50 metres away. The port is at 2.5 km. Arion rooms are spacious and tastefully furnished. Each comes with a TV, safety box and a mini fridge. All units also feature a private bathroom with shower and complimentary toiletries. Guests can enjoy a coffee or drink at the stylish lounge area of the bar. American buffet breakfast is served in the morning. Corfu International Airport is just 2 km away from Arion. Guests can visit Achillion Palace, located a 20-minute drive away, and Mon Repos Palace at a distance of 50 metres. The Byzantine church of Saint Jason and Sosipater is located right next to the property. The seaside village of Benitses is at 12 km. The casino is at 1 km, while Pontikonisi is 1.5 km away. Free on-site parking is available while reservation is not possible.

name: Corfu Hellinis Hotel
description: Hellinis Hotel is in the Kanoni area of Corfu, 600 metres from the beach and 3 km from Mon Repos Palace. It offers a large pool and a breakfast buffet in a spacious dining room. Rooms at the Hotel Hellinis are decorated in earthy colours and have tiled floors. They include air conditioning and a TV. All rooms have a balcony, some overlooking the airport runway. Guests can relax at the pool bar that serves drinks and coffee until late in the evening. The on-site restaurant serves Greek dishes. The swimming pool has a shallow section for children. Free Wi-Fi access is offered in public areas. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can provide information on the scenic Corfu Town just 4 km away. The famous Vlacherna Monastery is within a 5-minute walk. Corfu International Airport is 2.5 km away and free private parking is possible at the hotel.

name: Corfu Mare Hotel -Adults only
description: The adults-only Corfu Mare is a newly renovated boutique hotel, ideally situated in a quiet area just 2.5 km from Corfu Town. With views over the Ionian Sea, it features a pool and hot tub with fresh water. Refreshments and light meals are available to enjoy on the pool deck. To stimulate the guests senses, rooms are decorated according to themes with trendy and unusual wallpapers, colours and furniture. There are 2 rooms for guests with mobility issues. Guests can make use of the well equipped gym. The private parking area and the strategic location near the centre of Corfu Town make the Corfu Mare Hotel -Adults only the ultimate relaxation destination.

name: The Royal Hotel
description: Overlooking the enchanting Kanoni bay, situated in a charming region renowned for its rich cultural history, excellent food and outstanding views. The 3-star Royal Grand Hotel in Corfu Island is the perfect choice for a vacation immersed in the relaxing atmosphere of a warm and comfortable historical building, just five minutes from the historic center, surrounded by sightseeing miracles. Only 300 meters from the hotel is the secluded beach of Kanoni. Kanoni has beautiful pebble beach and also offers the most magnificent views of the Mouse island with the monastery of the Pantokrator and Vlaherna the monastery with which is joined via a small bridge. The colors, the bright azure, the sea blue, the emerald green consist an oasis for ones eyes and senses, a quiet cove with gorgeous views of the Ionian sea. It’s the perfect spot to while away a lazy afternoon in the sunshine, so schedule an appointment with the sun lounger! Then, when you want to cool off, stroll down to the sea and take a refreshing dip. Traditional Mediterranean cuisine combines with international delicacies in the hotel’s main restaurant of The Royal Grand Hotel. Serving extensive buffets for breakfast, lunch and dinner – including healthy and vegetarian options and don’t miss the chefs preparing fresh specialities Smoking - allowed Palaiopolis 110, Kanoni, Kerkyra 491 00VRBO

name: Ariti Grand Hotel Corfu
description: Hotel Ariti, surrounded by a 4000m2-garden, enjoys a central location in Kanoni area, only 3.5 km from Corfu Town. It features a swimming pool with a children's section and a restaurant. Free WiFi is available throughout. This family-run hotel offers air-conditioned rooms, with private bathroom, direct phone, TV, fridge and balcony with lagoon, garden, town or woods view. Ariti Hotel disposes a main bar and pool bar and parking facilities. The hotel’s lounge area opens to a wide terrace with breathtaking views over the lagoon, the airport and part of Corfu town. Guests staying at Ariti have quick access to nearby tennis courts and the casino which is at 3 km. Other nearby amenities include a fitness room and spa at only 200 metres from Ariti Hotel. Corfu International Airport is 1 km from the hotel.

name: Corfu Holiday Palace Hotel
description: Situated in Kanoni, Corfu Holiday Palace is located within easy driving distance of Corfu and Perama. An indoor pool and outdoor tennis courts are just some of the luxurious amenities on offer to guests during their stay. The hotel has recently been refurbished and offers a ballroom, a sauna and a bowling alley. For a quick and effortless check-in and departure experience, guests can benefit from the express check-in/check-out facility. The rooms at Corfu Holiday Palace are air-conditioned and include a telephone and an in-room closet. There are also multiple rooms especially designed for families. A satisfying breakfast is served every morning at Corfu Holiday Palace, and there are numerous restaurants and eateries close by. Room service is also offered during limited hours. Guests can set off on relaxed countryside walks or make use of Corfu Holiday Palace's bike rental service to explore the local area. Ideally located, the hotel is under a 10-minute car ride from Corfu International Airport.Revato
